Directions
Bring apple cider to a simmer in a medium saucepan. Add rye, Campari, and vermouth, stir until warm. Divide between 2 heatproof mugs or serving glasses, garnish with orange twist and serve immediately.
Notes
For the best results, use unfiltered fresh cider from your local orchard or farmers' market (or the refrigerated case at your grocery store).
